official_title: A bill to amend the Export Administration Act of 1979 to prohibit United States corporations from entering into commercial ventures using the Soviet space station and to prohibit United States satellites from being launched from launch vehicles owned by certain countries.

summary.text: Amends the Export Administration Act of 1979 to prohibit: (1) any U.S. corporation or State from entering into a commercial venture involving the use of a Soviet space station; and (2) any U.S. satellite from being launched from a launch vehicle owned by a controlled country.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Export Administration Act of 1979 to prohibit United States corporations from entering into commercial ventures using the Soviet space station and to prohibit United States satellites from being launched from launch vehicles owned by certain countries.
